ParticleSystemRenderer Class Reference

This is the base class for displaying a particle system on screen. More...

Detailed Description

This is the base class for displaying a particle system on screen.

void ParticleSystemRenderer::local ( bool  flag  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the local property.

Parameters:
flag The new value for the local property.

bool ParticleSystemRenderer::local (  )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the local property.

If local is set to true, the coordinates of the particle system are in local space rather than world space.

Returns:
The current status of the local flag.

void ParticleSystemRenderer::prerequisitesOfType ( DataSectionPtr  pSect,
std::set< std::string > &  output 
) [static]

This static method returns all of the resources that will be required to create the particle renderer.

It is designed so that the resources can be loaded in the loading thread before constructing the particle system

void ParticleSystemRenderer::viewDependent ( bool  flag  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the viewDependent property.

Parameters:
flag The new value for the viewDependent property.

bool ParticleSystemRenderer::viewDependent (  )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the viewDependent property.

If viewDependent is set to true, the coordinates of the particle system are in camera space rather than world space.

Returns:
The current status of the viewDependent flag.
